item.description:
Here's a chance to see the studio and some of our work. We've been making space for more creativity and want to show off the place. Learn what we're planning for the future and let us know what activities you'd like to see us add to the schedule.

We'll have some light refreshments. We hope you can join us!

DAY/TIME: Sunday, May 1, from 1 pm to 5 pm. Come for a few minutes or stay for the afternoon.

AGENDA: No scheduled activities. We're thinking of setting up a few creative activity stations, but we'll see.

AMENITIES: Free parking. You can see the studio tools (paper cutter, heat gun, etc.). Visitors and studio members have access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom.

COST: Free

WHO MAY ATTEND: Any member of the NE ATC+ Meetup, or anyone else interested in the studio. Our workshops are usually for adults only, but feel free to bring children this afternoon if you're willing to keep an eye on them (we've got some potentially dangerous tools around).

HOW TO SIGN UP: No RSVP necessary, but appreciated so we can have a rough idea of how many to expect.
item.why: You've never been to the studio or its been a long time. It's free.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: OPEN HOUSE to see ArtStudio 360 in Holliston
